data.title: August 2022
data.description: I officially became a student majoring in multi-platform application programming. In fact, I had already started self-studying programming with C++ in June 2022, but only at a basic level.

data.title: April 2024
data.description: In 2024, I applied to many companies, but most of my applications only reached the interview stage. In April, I was fortunate to be accepted into Avada Group as a Node.js intern, although I also worked with React.js. This was my first time working in a real-world environment, and I learned a lot. Thank you, Avada Group!
